people_also_ask.heading: The eleventh and final season of The Walking Dead, an American post-apocalyptic horror television series on AMC, premiered on August 22, 2021, and will consist of 24 episodes.
people_also_ask.title: The Walking Dead (season 11) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: The final season, titled "The Final Season Trilogy", premiered on August 22, 2021, on AMC and is set to contain 24 episodes that will be split into three eight-episode airing blocks, with the series concluding in 2022.
people_also_ask.title: The Walking Dead (season 11) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: The planned season finale was scheduled to air on April 12, 2020, but post-production was delayed due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. Instead, the episode aired on October 4, 2020, with an additional six episodes added to the tenth season that were broadcast from February 28 to April 4, 2021.
people_also_ask.title: The Walking Dead (season 10) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: between four and five weeks
people_also_ask.heading2: According to former Fear the Walking Dead showrunner Dave Erickson, Robert Kirkman has said that Rick was in a coma between four and five weeks [via Business Insider].23-Jul-2020

knowledge_panel.description: in the wake of a zombie apocalypse, various survivors struggle to stay alive. as they search for safety and evade the undead, they are forced to grapple with rival groups and difficult choices.
